meanings.sent1: The artist used ceruleans to paint the ocean in the picture.
meanings.sent2: The ceruleans of the flag stood out against the clear sky.
meanings.sent3: The ceruleans of the dress made her feel like a character from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with ceruleans, reflecting the beauty of the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The ceruleans of the flower petals were as vibrant as the summer sky.

meanings.definition: The sky or sea on a clear day
meanings.sent1: The ceruleans of the sky were breathtaking on that sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent2: Sailing on the ceruleans of the sea felt like a dream come true.
meanings.sent3: The ceruleans of the ocean seemed to invite her for a swim.
meanings.sent4: The ceruleans of the sky stretched endlessly, like a vast canvas above us.
meanings.sent5: The ceruleans of the sea sparkled under the bright sun, mesmerizing all who gazed upon it.
